alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:40PM EDT until April 15 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 740 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Cottonwood to 11 miles east of Marianna to 11 miles west of Chattahoochee to near Blountstown to 10 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Bainbridge, Midway, Donalsonville, Quincy, Havana, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Gretna, Attapulgus, Iron City, Climax, Brinson, Juniper, Douglas City, Florence, Jamieson, Recovery and Laingkat. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
